thread.title: Watch James Bond fight Mr Hinx in a brutal train carriage fight from Spectre - Movies
thread.title_full: Watch James Bond fight Mr Hinx in a brutal train carriage fight from Spectre - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Watch James Bond fight Mr Hinx in a brutal train carriage fight from Spectre - Movies
text: It wouldn't be James Bond without a fight in some kind of moving vehicle and thankfully Spectre doesn't disappoint. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4574273845001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14574273845001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4574273845001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; ai_type="video"; } In a newly released Spectre clip, 007 and latest henchman Mr Hinx get into a brutal train carriage fight, with the pair smashing through a few walls and breaking some expensive-looking decor.The clip has dropped ahead of Spectre's UK release next week.Further teasers including an epic car chase, a meeting with Q and an intimate moment with Monica Bellucci's Lucia Sciarra have also premiered. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); ai_type="video"; } The latest outing for the world's most famous spy will see James Bond on his own when the international terror group SPECTRE and its enigmatic leader Franz Oberhauser (Christoph Waltz) target him.Star Daniel Craig recently revealed Spectre might not be his last Bond despite saying he'd rather "break this glass and slash my wrists" than do another one.Spectre will be released in the UK on October 26 and November 6 in the US.
